text: aur use (apanee onkhon se) dekh rahe hain aur (ye vakt tha) jab khuda tumase vaayada kar raha tha ki (kuphphaar makka) do jamaaton mein se ek tumhaare lie zarooree hain aur tum ye chaahate the ki kamazor jamaat tumhaare haath lage (taaki bagair lade bhide maale ganeemat haath aa jae) aur khuda ye chaahata tha ki apanee baaton se haq ko saabit (qadam) karen aur kaaphiron kee jad kaat daale
